trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around May 19th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsIt had three flashing lights, two red and one green, it came from the direction of Heathrow and emitted a low growling noise. I was walking home from the pub. I noticed it because I looked up and it was there. When I first noticed it I thought it was just an aeroplane. It was travelling across the sky in a steady, continuous movement. During the sighting I thought, "ooh, that's interesting". After the sighting I thought, "ooh, that was interesting". I felt a sudden shiver. I lost sight of the object when I went inside my flat. I couldn't see it from in there.
Summary: Overhead lights flashing through the clouds
